intro: Ride along as Barbie™, and Barbie with your horse, Lucky on a wild adventure.
description:
Giddy up! Play as Barbie™ and Barbie in a new open-world adventure through Canterbury Trails Park with your horse, Lucky.

Become a Junior Ranger and help give the already amazing park a fresh new look for everyone to enjoy. Gallop through wildflower fields and other beautiful landscapes. Tackle fun side missions with friends, capture amazing photos, dig up ceramics, and search for the mystery horse. Find chests filled with collectibles and add sparkle to Barbie and Lucky’s looks.

From the cozy cabins to the lively campsite there is plenty to unlock and discover. 

Ride along on this wild adventure and see!

CARE FOR HORSES: Groom and accessorize your horse, Lucky, as you build a memorable friendship with her. 

PLAY AS BARBIE: Take the reins as Barbie ‘Brooklyn’ Roberts or Barbie ‘Malibu’ Roberts.

EXPLORE THE OPEN-WORLD: Walk, trot, or gallop with Lucky and discover the park’s beauty.  

TRAIN AS A JUNIOR RANGER: Learn how to care for Canterbury Trails Park with help from nature experts.

CAPTURE WILDLIFE MOMENTS: Use your camera to take photos of animals, plants and other discoveries then save them in your journal to help you on your quests.
